item.title: CVE-2024-3215|2024-05-02T16:52:29.758Z -- strangerstudios -- paid%20memberships%20pro%20%E2%80%93%20content%20restriction%2C%20user%20registration%2C%20%26%20paid%20subscriptions
item.description: The Paid Memberships Pro â€“ Content Restriction, User Registration, & Paid Subscriptions plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 3.0.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the pmpro_update_level_group_order() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update order levels via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
